shloka: ध्यानं यथार्थतः कृत्वा परमं परमं उच्यते |
translation: Meditation on the Supreme is the path to liberation.
Abandon all other duties and surrender to Me alone.
To protect the righteous and destroy the wicked.

shloka: जन्म कर्म च मे दिव्यम् एवं यो वेत्ति तत्त्वत: |
translation: Whoever understands my divine birth and deeds, will be free from all karmic entanglements.
